General.Name: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited
General.Description: Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited produces and distributes crude palm oil and palm Kernel products in Thailand. It offers crude palm oil for palm oil refineries to be used in the food and other industries, such as the production of biscuits, creamer, and ice cream, as well as for shampoo manufacturing industryand in the production of fatty acids, methyl ester, etc. The company also provides palm kernel oils that are used as ingredients in the production of margarine, bread, fats for food, cosmetics, and health supplements; raw materials for oleochemicals industry; and seed residue is used as ingredient in animal food. In addition, it offers by products, such as seeds, palm shells, empty bunches, decanter cakes, and fibers. Further, the company is also involved in energy production by using wastewater, as well as produce biogas to be used as fuel. Vichitbhan Palmoil Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Supaluck  Tiasevanakul
1.Title: Deputy MD of Accounting, Fin. & Office and Director
